pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes plus socks; Chemical-resistant gloves are required for applicators using hand-held equipment

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, or using tobacco.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
